entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
